Load log file.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
DATA_PATH <- "data/city_state_log.csv"
data <- read.csv(DATA_PATH, skip = 1, header = FALSE)
colnames(data) <- c("timestamp", "state", "footfall_0", "nothing", "footfall_1", "response_time")
```

Format timestamp

```{r}
data['ts'] <- ymd_hms(data$timestamp) + 3600
data_tbl <- as_tibble(data)
tz(data$ts) <- "Europe/London"
```

Plot footfall <- take this one

```{r}
ggplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "Northumberland Street (2 footfall sensors)") + 
  xlab("Time (BST)") + ylab("People count (60 minutes sliding window)") +
  geom_line(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_0), colour="blue") +
  geom_line(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_1), colour="lightblue") +
  ylim(c(0,50)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=25, colour="orange") 
```

```{r}
from_ts <-  ymd_hms("2020-06-13 16:00:00 BST")
to_ts <-  ymd_hms("2020-06-13 20:00:00 BST")
sub_data_tbl <- data_tbl %>% 
  filter(ts >= from_ts) %>%
  filter(ts < to_ts)

green_rect <- data.frame(xmin=from_ts - 3600, xmax=to_ts + 3600, ymin=-Inf, ymax=25)
amber_rect <- data.frame(xmin=from_ts - 3600, xmax=to_ts + 3600, ymin=25, ymax=Inf)
ggplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "Northumberland Street (2 footfall sensors)") + 
  xlab("Time (BST)") + ylab("People count (60 minutes sliding window)") +
  geom_line(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_0), colour="blue") +
  geom_point(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_0), colour="blue") +
  geom_line(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_1), colour="lightblue") +
  geom_point(data=sub_data_tbl, aes(ts, footfall_1), colour="lightblue") +
  ylim(c(0,50)) +
  geom_rect(data=green_rect, aes(xmin=xmin, xmax=xmax, ymin=ymin, ymax=ymax),
              fill="green",
              alpha=0.05,
              inherit.aes = FALSE) +
    geom_rect(data=amber_rect, aes(xmin=xmin, xmax=xmax, ymin=ymin, ymax=ymax),
              fill="orange",
              alpha=0.05,
              inherit.aes = FALSE) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=25, colour="orange") 
  #geom_hline(yintercept=100, colour="red")
```
